Title: Object: The Tower of Faros the fourth Wonder of the World
Series: The Seven Wonders of the World
Description: Popular print: the lighthouse of Alexandria; a seascape with the enormous tower on an island in the distance; on the mainland to right is a city from which a snaking bridge leads to the island; in the foreground, to right, the architect shows a drawing of the lighthouse to King Ptolemy; copy in reverse of a print published by Crispijn de Passe I after Maarten de Vos. Engraving and etching
Curator's comments: The sixth "Wonder of the World" is missing from the set.
Bibliographic references: Hollstein / Dutch and Flemish etchings, engravings and woodcuts c.1450-1700 (1312) (Vos; copy)
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Winifred Margaret Klingender (Bonhams, Oxford, 23.ii.2010)
